<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Gourd Leshy](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3080)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Gourd leshies are guardians of fields, gardens, and farms. Many villages benefit from the protection of a gourd leshy, even if they are unaware of it.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Plant](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Gourd Leshy](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3080)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Leshy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=639" />
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=668" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 217 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +5; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=69)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Fey](/Languages.aspx?ID=119); [_speak with plants_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1681) (gourds only)

**Skills**
[Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +5, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** -1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Keepsake** ([primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=676)) The leshy can store an item of light Bulk or less in their head, concealing it as [_veil of privacy_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1739). If stored for 24 hours, the item benefits from [_mending_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1597).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +7 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 20

</row>

**Verdant Burst** ([healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=623), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=676), [vitality](/Traits.aspx?ID=509)) When a gourd leshy dies, a burst of primal energy explodes from their body, restoring 1d8 Hit Points to each [plant](/Traits.aspx?ID=668) creature in a 30-foot emanation. This area is filled with gourds, becoming [difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=453). If the terrain is not a viable environment for these plants, they wither after 24 hours.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 bludgeoning plus ensnare

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
seed +9 ([range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 bludgeoning plus ensnare

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 15
- **Constant (3rd)**
[Speak with Plants](/Spells.aspx?ID=294) (gourds only)

**[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=55)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) The leaf leshy transforms into a Small gourd-bearing plant. This ability otherwise uses the effects of [_one with plants_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1618).

**Ensnare**   When the gourd leshy damages a creature with a fist or seed Strike, vines lash out from the leshy (or seed) and wrap around the target's limbs. The target must attempt a DC 17 Reflex save. On a failure, the target takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speed for 1 round; on a critical failure, the target is [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=81) for 1 round and the penalty to Speed lasts for 1 minute.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-437" />
name: Gourd Leshy
